column4: How do I view Empathy notfications. For example I got the notification "Blah has request to view your status". Before Unity I could click on Empathys icon and view the notification and respond to it. Now I can't figure out where/how to do this.
At the top right of your window, there should be a chat-like icon. Click on it, and Empathy should be there.
nope, I only have an e-mail icon but I don't see any notifications listed.
The mail icon has a 'Chat' option. That is the location of Empathy. Other than that, I'm not sure.
